startup_mvp.title: Startup MVP Environment
startup_mvp.business_context: A startup needs to quickly deploy their MVP to validate product-market fit
startup_mvp.user_request:
We're a fintech startup launching our MVP. We need:

Business Requirements:
- Secure web application for 1000+ concurrent users
- PCI DSS compliance for payment processing
- 99.9% uptime SLA
- Auto-scaling for traffic spikes
- Separate dev/staging/prod environments

Technical Needs:
- React frontend with global CDN
- Node.js API with load balancing
- PostgreSQL database with encryption
- Redis for session management
- Application monitoring and alerts
- CI/CD pipeline integration

Budget: $500/month initially, scalable to $2000/month

Timeline: Production ready in 3 days

monthly_reports.title: Monthly Reports Storage
monthly_reports.business_context: Company needs secure storage for monthly reports with automatic notifications
monthly_reports.user_request: We need a secure place to store our monthly business reports. When someone uploads a new report, we want to automatically send an email notification.
clarifying_questions: What email address should receive the notifications when reports are uploaded?
What types of reports will you be storing (e.g., PDF, Excel, Word)?
How many reports do you expect to upload per month?
suggested_answers: We have about 5-6 people who upload reports, usually once per month so around 5-6 uploads total per month.
The reports are mainly PDF files and Excel spreadsheets, typically around 2-5 MB each.
Please send email notifications to marcel.scherenberg@prodyna.com whenever a new report is uploaded.
Only our internal team should be able to upload and view the reports - no external access needed. Basic security is fine, nothing too complex.
This is just for internal use within our organization. However, everything be publically accessible so that we can access it without VPN.
No other requirements at this point in time! Make sure to use the existing resource group 'rg-iap-demo' for deployment.

document_backup.title: Document Backup and Archive Solution
document_backup.business_context: Company needs reliable backup storage for important business documents
document_backup.user_request: We need a reliable backup solution for our important business documents. We want secure storage with monitoring to track when files are uploaded.
clarifying_questions: Approximately how much data (in GB or TB) do you expect to store initially, and what is your anticipated growth rate?
How frequently will backups occur (e.g., daily, weekly, real-time)?
Who should have access to the stored documents, and are there any specific access control requirements?
What is your preferred retention period for the backups?
Do you require the ability to restore individual files, or full backups only?
Are there any specific monitoring or alerting features you need?
suggested_answers: We expect to store around 50-100 GB initially, with maybe 20-30 GB growth per year as we add more monthly reports.
We'd like to back up files weekly, nothing too frequent since these are mainly monthly business reports.
Basic access controls are fine, nothing too complex.
We need to keep backups for at least 7 years for compliance reasons.
We mainly need to restore individual files when someone accidentally deletes or corrupts a report.
Basic monitoring would be helpful - just knowing when things fail and why.
Please use the existing resource group 'rg-iap-demo' for deployment.
No other requirements at this point in time!

file_sharing_portal.title: Simple File Sharing Portal
file_sharing_portal.business_context: Small team needs a web portal to share and access business documents
file_sharing_portal.user_request: We need a web portal where our team can upload and download business documents. Just a straightforward way to share files with each other using secure cloud storage.
clarifying_questions: Approximately how many users will access the portal?
What types and sizes of documents will be uploaded?
Should access be restricted to your team only or do you need public access?
Do you require versioning or audit logs for uploaded/downloaded files?
Would you like notifications when new documents are uploaded or downloaded?
suggested_answers: About 8-12 team members will access the portal regularly, so a small team.
Mainly PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, and PowerPoint presentations. Most files are under 10MB, but occasionally we might have larger presentations up to 50MB.
Access should be restricted to our network only, but we want to keep the login process simple - nothing too complicated like having to use your Microsoft account.
We don't need versioning or detailed audit logs - just basic functionality to upload and download files.
No notifications needed - we just want a simple file sharing solution without extra complexity.
Please use the existing resource group 'rg-iap-demo' for deployment.
No other requirements at this point in time!
